Description: Painted and stuccoed rectangular plinth with part of the left foot and right leg of the figure still attached.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 224)
